name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
desc: Charges Dewdrop when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of HP restored.
enhanced_desc: Charges "Dewdrop" when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of HP restored. Moreover, increases the DMG of "Dewdrop" by 40%.
